Reviews.Title: Weather proof stickers.
Reviews.Author: techhead2k
Reviews.Content: Nice set of stickers. Appear to be weather proof. Letting people know you have a security system is the best way to prevent a problem from happening. I did not want to stick these on my freshly painted steel doors so I got a sheet of magnetic material ( the stuff I bought was for covering unused heating vents sold at home centers and DollarTree) and cut it to the shape of the sticker. Stick the decal on these and then put the magnet on the door.

Reviews.Title: Good sized decal with plenty of visibility
Reviews.Author: arjay
Reviews.Content: Just what I needed.  Our surveillance system didn't come with enough decals (or maybe I misplaced them).  In any event, in my opinion the greatest value of video surveillance is as a deterrent, so it makes sense to have plenty of warnings posted.

Reviews.Title: Very professional looking!
Reviews.Author: RCC Advocate "Pia"
Reviews.Content: Easily mounted, but it cannot be put on a storm door window, since the adhesive is on the back of the sign.  It required mounting directly on the "entry" door so the elements will not erode it.  However, it is still readily visible  through the storm door.

Reviews.Title: These are 4 small stickers, NOT decals
Reviews.Author: Cathy
Reviews.Content: They are okay, but I know when I stick them on the outside that it's only a matter of time before the weather destroys them.  I was hoping they were decals or the type of stickers that could be stuck from the inside.  They are expensive for 4 little stickers.

Reviews.Title: security decal
Reviews.Author: Mar j
Reviews.Content: They are very nice. They stick well and exactly what I ordered. I highly recommend these to put on doors or windows.

Reviews.Title: good product
Reviews.Author: lala
Reviews.Content: printed very well. big and clear font. Good quality. I need to see how long it can last under UV

Reviews.Title: Review of Security Decals 4 pack
Reviews.Author: cj
Reviews.Content: These are good decals, and look genuine. i would recommend them to all business owners and individuals.Moderately priced as well.

Reviews.Title: Great Warning Decal
Reviews.Author: jay
Reviews.Content: Got this for my apartment due to a recent break in we had, Sticker is in good quality on vinyl and would take weather like water great, I don't know about fading from the sun but all in all it came on time.

Reviews.Title: Excellent quality
Reviews.Author: stevenwalsh1
Reviews.Content: Premium quality sticker.  Can't say yet as to long term.  I was going to try to move one off of a window a couple of days after I applied it... it wasn't coming off without a scraper!

Reviews.Title: NICE
Reviews.Author: Dan B.
Reviews.Content: Very nice! since I have surveillance cameras at first I thought no to the letting people know, but then I thought yes

Reviews.Title: Camera in use decals
Reviews.Author: Mike in Texas
Reviews.Content: Official looking camera in use  decals. A bit larger than I expected but maybe even better.  I have Thea outside, so I'll be watching the effects of the elements

Reviews.Title: seem to be well made
Reviews.Author: Lissa Lissa
Reviews.Content: We have posted these around our property and they are holding up very well.  No fading and no peeling.  They are small decals not signs but the coloring makes them very noticeable when placed on a door or window.  The first thing most people do when they see them is start looking around for the camera, so don't place them near your cameras if you fear someone will try to break them in order to break in :>)

Reviews.Title: Crime Stopper
Reviews.Author: JHughes "Jhughes0056"
Reviews.Content: This is one of the best ways to make criminals think twice. I put these on several key places outside and of course I have cameras. Good sturdy product.

Reviews.Title: Warning to thieves
Reviews.Author: Tball
Reviews.Content: Its a warning sign.  its pretty small but it will help deter would be thieves whether you have a system installed or are using a fake cam.  I put them up and do have a system installed.  I would rather just have them drive away then not know I have a system and try to break it.

Reviews.Title: Guard dog signs
Reviews.Author: Ironwulf "All paradise rests in the shadow of...
Reviews.Content: My customer was quite satisfied with these after I installed a four camera system on his house. I put these on all most approachable avenues in plain sight.PS: NO WAY can an intruder get close without being caught in a camera.

Reviews.Title: poor quality product.
Reviews.Author: Julia C. Sears
Reviews.Content: Let me be clear ... I did not purchase this exact item. However, I have purchased similar ones off eBay (they look almost exactly the same and are in the same price range), I have had 4 stickers faded when use outside in one week. They are not weatherproof. Do not buy this poor quality product.

ProductInfo.Name: SECURITY DECAL - 4 Pack #204 Commercial Security, Surveillance Video CCTV Warning! Deterrence Decals - #204
